long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BoldSpeed Reading - Accelerate Your Reading Speed

Description:

Fast, efficient, and more comprehensible - BoldSpeed Reading takes your reading experience to the next level!

BoldSpeed Reading is a unique Chrome extension designed to help users read English content on webpages faster and more efficiently. The extension employs a reading technique known as "Bionic Reading," a method that guides your eyes and accelerates your reading speed by bolding parts of words.

How does it work?

Upon clicking our extension icon, BoldSpeed Reading instantly transforms the text on your current webpage into the Bionic Reading format. This format highlights the initial letters of each word, guiding your eyes to these artificial fixation points, and allowing your brain to complete the rest. This reduces the number of letters your eyes need to scan, enabling you to read faster while still retaining the full context of the text.

Join us in revolutionizing the reading experience!

Download BoldSpeed Reading today and discover a new, innovative way to consume content. Happy reading!
